Option Name: Detailed Example: 10.0 kW, Standard, 14% System Losses, 96% Inverter Efficiency
# Maximum Power Output: Peak power for the PV system.
# Module Type: The type of PV module.
# System Losses Fraction: The total PV system losses including soiling, shading, snow, degradation, etc.
# Inverter Efficiency: Efficiency of the PV system inverter.
